tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE inventory_levels (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    medicine_name VARCHAR(255),
    quantity INT,
    expiration_date DATE,
    clinic_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE clinics_inventory (
    clinic_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    clinic_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    medicine_id INT NOT NULL,
    medicine_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    quantity INT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE medicine_stock (
    medicine_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    medicine_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    stock_location VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    quantity_in_stock INT NOT NULL,
    expiration_date DATE NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE inventory ( 
    id INT, 
    medication_id INT, 
    clinic_id INT, 
    quantity INT NOT NULL, 
    FOREIGN KEY (medication_id) REFERENCES medications(id), 
    FOREIGN KEY (clinic_id) REFERENCES clinics(clinic_id) 
);
CREATE TABLE Medicines (medicine_id INT PRIMARY KEY, medicine_name TEXT NOT NULL, quantity INT NOT NULL, expiry_date DATE);
CREATE TABLE Clinics (clinic_id INT PRIMARY KEY, clinic_name TEXT NOT NULL, location TEXT NOT NULL);
CREATE TABLE Inventory (inventory_id INT PRIMARY KEY, clinic_id INT REFERENCES Clinics(clinic_id), medicine_id INT REFERENCES Medicines(medicine_id), quantity INT NOT NULL);

CREATE TABLE Transactions (transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, clinic_id INT REFERENCES Clinics(clinic_id), medicine_id INT REFERENCES Medicines(medicine_id), quantity INT NOT NULL, transaction_date TIMESTAMP);
CREATE TABLE clinic (clinic_id INT PRIMARY KEY, clinic_name TEXT, location TEXT, contact_number TEXT)
CREATE TABLE medicine (medicine_id INT PRIMARY KEY, medicine_name TEXT, quantity INT, expiry_date DATE)

CREATE TABLE inventory (inventory_id INT PRIMARY KEY, clinic_id INT, medicine_id INT, quantity INT, FOREIGN KEY (clinic_id) REFERENCES clinic(clinic_id), FOREIGN KEY (medicine_id) REFERENCES medicine(medicine_id))
CREATE TABLE supplier (supplier_id INT PRIMARY KEY, supplier_name TEXT, contact_number TEXT)

CREATE TABLE supply_history (supply_id INT PRIMARY KEY, inventory_id INT, supplier_id INT, supply_date DATE, quantity_supplied INT, FOREIGN KEY (inventory_id) REFERENCES inventory(inventory_id), FOREIGN KEY (supplier_id) REFERENCES supplier(supplier_id))
